WorkItem.Description:
<@BamYazi> re. occlusion culling - slaihne uses 6 vertex buffers per chunk - one per each face direction, then each frame you only submit the vertex buffers for visible faces. 
I can see this working on PC's, but the reason i went for a single vertex buffer in original techcraft is
 that the XBOX sucks for draw calls but has a massive fill rate so overdraw or culling is faster on the GPU.
 I wouldn't bother at the moment but once the
Build/Generate stuff is in place it would be straight forward to do a renderer which uses this technique
